en: Illinois Coordinate System of 1983 Lincoln zone (US survey foot): Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP) (Illinois_Coordinate_System_of_1983_Lincoln_zone__US_survey_foot_)
Part of the ICS83 33-zone system. Longitude of origin also given by information source as 270°12'E. State law defines grid unit as US survey foot. No equivalent metric definition.
